CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1-3 Current state - of - the - art polymeric materials have allowed for the fabrication of OFETs with mobilities of over 1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and OPV devices with power conversion efficiencies ( PCEs ) of over 9% .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Polymeric materials
2. OFETs (Organic Field-Effect Transistors)
3. OPV devices (Organic Photovoltaic Devices)

So, the three material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. Polymeric materials
2. OFETs
3. OPV devices
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. Polymeric materials
2. OPV devices

So, the two material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. Polymeric materials
2. OPV devices

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymeric materials |
| OPV devices |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1-3 Current state - of - the - art polymeric materials have allowed for the fabrication of OFETs with mobilities of over 1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and OPV devices with power conversion efficiencies ( PCEs ) of over 9% .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. "mobilities" - refers to the mobility of charge carriers in the polymeric material.
2. "PCEs" - refers to the power conversion efficiency of the organic photovoltaic (OPV) devices.

So, the two "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. mobilities
2. PCEs
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant "Property Name" entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties:

1. mobilities
2. PCEs

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to material properties:

* "OFETs" (Organic Field-Effect Transistors) - this is a device type, not a material property.
* "power conversion efficiencies" - this is an abstract concept, not a material property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Property Name" entities from the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| mobilities |
| PCEs |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1-3 Current state - of - the - art polymeric materials have allowed for the fabrication of OFETs with mobilities of over 1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and OPV devices with power conversion efficiencies ( PCEs ) of over 9% .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. mobilities: This is a property value that refers to the ability of a material to conduct electricity, specifically the speed at which charge carriers (such as electrons or holes) can move through the material. In the context of the paragraph, the mobility of over 1 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1 refers to the ability of the polymeric materials to conduct electricity.
2. power conversion efficiencies (PCEs): This is another property value that refers to the ability of a material or device to convert energy from one form to another. In the context of the paragraph, the PCEs of over 9% refer to the ability of the OPV devices to convert light energy into electrical energy with an efficiency of over 9%.

So, the two property values mentioned in the paragraph are mobilities and power conversion efficiencies (PCEs).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. mobilities: This is a property value that refers to the ability of a material to conduct electricity, specifically the speed at which charge carriers (such as electrons or holes) can move through the material.
2. power conversion efficiencies (PCEs): This is another property value that refers to the ability of a material or device to convert energy from one form to another. In the context of the paragraph, the PCEs of over 9% refer to the ability of the OPV devices to convert light energy into electrical energy with an efficiency of over 9%.

So, the two relevant entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph are mobilities and power conversion efficiencies (PCEs).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| mobilities |
| power conversion efficiencies (PCEs) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
